revised_title: Generating Functions and Coaxial Minors in the Theory of Numbers
tldr: The author explores generating functions and their relationship with coaxial minors in the context of number theory. They develop a theorem that connects the coefficients of a generating function with the coaxial minors of a determinant, providing insights into the structure and properties of these functions. This work contributes to the understanding of generating functions and their applications in various fields.
